snippet: E. J. Manuel hit Rashad Greene with a slant pass that Greene took 39 yards for a touchdown with 40 seconds to play, and No. 8 Florida State survived a scare to beat Virginia Tech, 28-22.
abstract: Florida State survives scare to beat Virginia Tech, 28-22, in college football.
lead_paragraph: E. J. Manuel hit Rashad Greene with a slant pass that Greene took 39 yards for a touchdown with 40 seconds to play, and No. 8 Florida State survived a scare to beat Virginia Tech, 28-22.

keywords.value: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University
